001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.io.PrintStream;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.function.Supplier;
007
008import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * Logging about logging. Currently not really public API.
012 *
013 * @author agentgt
014 * @hidden
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("InvalidBlockTag")
017public final class MetaLog {
018
019        private MetaLog() {
020        }
021
022        /**
023         * Logs an error in the logging system.
024         * @param event event to log.
025         */
026        public static void error(LogEvent event) {
027                FailsafeAppender.INSTANCE.log(event);
028        }
029
030        /**
031         * Logs an error in the logging system.
032         * @param loggerName derived from class.
033         * @param throwable error to log.
034         */
035        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, Throwable throwable) {
036                String m = Objects.requireNonNullElse(throwable.getMessage(), "exception");
037                error(loggerName, m, throwable);
038        }
039
040        /**
041         * Logs an error in the logging system.
042         * @param loggerName derived from class.
043         * @param message error message.
044         * @param throwable error to log.
045         */
046        public static void error(Class<?> loggerName, String message, Throwable throwable) {
047                var event = LogEvent.of(Level.ERROR, loggerName.getName(), message, throwable);
048                error(event);
049        }
050
051        static Supplier<? extends @Nullable PrintStream> output = () -> System.err;
052
053}
054
055enum FailsafeAppender implements LogEventLogger {
056
057        INSTANCE;
058
059        @Override
060        public void log(LogEvent event) {
061                if (event.level().compareTo(Level.ERROR) >= 0) {
062                        var err = MetaLog.output.get();
063                        if (err != null) {
064                                err.append("[ERROR] - RAINBOW_GUM ");
065                                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
066                                event.formattedMessage(sb);
067                                err.append(sb.toString());
068
069                                var throwable = event.throwableOrNull();
070                                if (throwable != null) {
071                                        err.append(" ");
072                                        throwable.printStackTrace(err);
073                                }
074                        }
075                }
076        }
077
078}
